model.name: resumable
model.title: Resumable
model.description: Resume EIP to support resuming processing from last known offset.
model.label: eip,routing

resumeStrategy.description: Sets the resume strategy to use

intermittent.label: advanced
intermittent.description: Sets whether the offsets will be intermittently present or whether they must be present in every exchange

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Whether to disable this EIP from the route.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
